column1: Ohh, neighborhood detectives, huh? Well let me thi-oh yes! There is something!
Yes. Two days ago I put a fresh baked cherry pie out on my window sill to cool.  And later, when I went to get it, it was gone.
Noo, but I think it's a perfect case for you kids.
My pie tin! Oooh, but what happened to the pie?
Oh my God, what kind of television have you kids been watching??
All right, all right, you you boys run along now.
